attributes.action: ensure the relevant government departments fully engage with the BBC Trust to ensure efficiency savings are in the best interest of licence fee payers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC needs to make savings - yet the licence fee payers is not being consulted in any meaningful way.

The BBC pays millions to one or two presenters and offers limosines etc to others.  
These two issues demonstrate how the BBC is missing the point of what it is there to do. 
The BBC is a public sector body for the benefit of all.
